channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Crypto Industry Hopes Trump Can Finally Get Them Bank Accounts
item.description: Crypto venture capitalists and founders are counting on the incoming administration and a new pressure campaign to repair relationships with big banks...

item.title: Gold prices could hit $3,000 per ounce in 2025, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: Goldman Sachs analysts said the rally in gold prices could continue into 2025, even if the value of the dollar continues to rise as expected

item.title: Fundstrat’s Tom Lee is no longer one of Wall Street’s biggest bulls. Why he’s cautious on 2025.
item.description: But after two years of back-to-back 20%-plus gains for the S&P 500, Fundstrat’s head of research Tom Lee is taking a more cautious stance for 2025,

item.title: U.S. CPI Data Could Push Treasury Yields Higher
item.description: Treasury yields were higher and could rise further if inflation data are higher than expected, Brown Brothers said.

item.title: Nasdaq Futures Rise as Investors Await Inflation Data
item.description: U.S. stock futures were muted, split between small gains and losses as traders await consumer-price index data.

item.title: Investor optimism toward U.S. stocks has eclipsed 2000’s dot-com bubble. That raises the risk of a ‘negative’ shock.
item.description: “U.S. consumers have never felt so optimistic about gains in the stock market over the next 12 months,” according to Deutsche Bank Research.

item.title: U.S. CPI Data Could Push Dollar Higher
item.description: The U.S. dollar rose and could rise further if inflation data are higher than expected, Brown Brothers said.

item.title: How Booming Leveraged Funds Can Incinerate Your Money
item.description: Variants soon might include long-short funds resembling steel-cage matches.

item.title: This woman has trained thousands of people to help others have a ‘good death’
item.description: It may be time to change the way we view — and plan for — death

item.title: Why Cathie Wood may have the best fund to play Trump 2.0
item.description: Exposure to crypto, Musk and defense is bolstering this ETF
